page.title: 06COMMUNITY AFFAIRS
page.content: THE HOTEL HAS NEVER HAD A FIRE,BUT THEY HAD A FEW BREAK-INS.THEY HAVE A LARGE SELECTION OF WINES AND SPIRITS, AND MUST OBTAIN THEIR SUPPLIES FROM THE TOLLY BREWERY WHO OWNS THE PUB.THE GOLDEN HIND EMPLOYS 15 STAFF ALTOGETHER.NORMALLY THE PUB CLOSES AT 11P.M. BUT EXTENTION IS GRANTED FOR PARTIES,RECEPTIONS,ETC. THEY HAVE A LOUNGE BAR AND{"OFF LICENCE"}IT IS A POPULAR PUB.A LOT OF CUSTOMERS GO,ESPECIALY AT WEEK-ENDS WHICH IS THEIR BUSIEST PERIOD. {c)THE JENNY WREN PUBLIC HOUSE}HAS SIMILAR FACILITIES AND THE LANDLADY,MRS GIBSON KINDLY ANSWERED OUR QUESTIONS.IT IS MUCH SMALLER,WITH FEWER CUSTOMERS.{d)KINGS HEDGES POST {OFFICE:}ON 25th JUNE WE VISITED KING'S HEDGES POST OFFICE WHERE WE MET MR MURFET WHO ANSWERED OUR QUESTIONS.HE SAID THAT THE BUILDING
